embassy.md_1: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
embassy.md_2: The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text.
embassy.md_3: And a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

article_01.desc_01:
##### __DKT__ - {{ section.post.vars.post.name }}
***
## __The Way__ to go with success
#### is to keep __thankfull__, to all __obstacles__ afterwards.  
[__'Albert Einstein'__](https://duckduckgo.com), is a heavy influencer  
of the 20th Century.  
****
**$t({{vars.test}})** :  One piece of the Future, 1985.  [__'Albert Einstein'__](),

DKT__contacts.email_txt: Please feel free to leave us an email concerning any of our products or other requests.
DKT__contacts.postmail_txt: And we still open our mailbox on daily basis!

DKT__products.certif_01:
| Our 
span.dkt products  
| have all obtained licensing and certification from 
strong.dkt ISO-4501-8888.
DKT__products.certif_02: | They are under constant check and control as we speak. Numerous consecutive tests puts them at a hard training, through the whole process of multiple building-unbuilding preface, until full-and-functional delivery.
DKT__products.certif_03: | They then are shipped under cimilarily checkable controls, by partner and certified shipper, until they become part of client's property, which falls under, again various of our insurances policies.
